[Verse 1}
        [ch]E[/ch]
You can hear the songbirds singing 
        [ch]F#m[/ch]
And you watch the clouds roll by
          [ch]B[/ch]
Then your walking in the valley
       [ch]E[/ch]
As the sun shines in a clear blue sky
       [ch]A[/ch]
You’re welcoming your loved ones
        [ch]G#m[/ch]                [ch]C#[/ch]
And you can’t believe your eyes
         [ch]F#m[/ch]         [ch]B[/ch]
Yes this earthly paradise
    [ch]F#m[/ch]  [ch]B[/ch]          [ch]E[/ch]
Was just around the corner

[ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]B[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]

[Verse 2]
          [ch]E[/ch]
There's a house down in the valley
      [ch]F#m[/ch]
And a house high on the hill
         [ch]B[/ch]
There is singing by the river
       [ch]E[/ch]
As the water flows and turns the mill
    [ch]A[/ch]
The golden fields are waiting
        [ch]G#m[/ch]          [ch]C#[/ch]
Let the harvesting begin
         [ch]F#m[/ch]               [ch]B[/ch]
Once the world were living in 
     [ch]F#m[/ch]   [ch]B[/ch]        [ch]E[/ch]
Was just around the corner

[Bridge]
     [ch]A[/ch]
It’s great to share with friends who care 
    [ch]G#m[/ch]                   [ch]C#[/ch]                               
The things that we looked forward to
    [ch]F#[/ch]
Now every tear has disappeared 
    [ch]B[/ch]                  
The world is young and life is new 

[Verse 3]
         [ch]E[/ch]
There's a sound of happy voices 
        [ch]F#m[/ch]
And the scent of new mown hay 
         [ch]B[/ch]
Now your calling to your loved ones
       [ch]E[/ch]
As you start another perfect day 
        [ch]A[/ch]
Then we thank our God Jehovah
        [ch]G#m[/ch]           [ch]C#[/ch]
For His tender loving care
        [ch]F#m[/ch]              [ch]B[/ch]
Yes the blessings we all share 
     [ch]F#m[/ch]   [ch]B[/ch]         [ch]E[/ch]
Were just around the corner
 
[Bridge]
    [ch]A[/ch]
And every day Ill smile and say
     [ch]G#m[/ch]              [ch]C#[/ch]
“How good to see your happy face” 
      [ch]F#[/ch]
Cause once it seemed I only dreamed 
     [ch]B[/ch]
That you’d be in my warm embrace
 
[Verse 4]
[ch]E[/ch]
Waiting ‘round the corner
     [ch]F#m[/ch]
Is a world I long to see 
       [ch]B[/ch]
It’s a promise from Jehovah
       [ch]E[/ch]
It’s a guaranteed reality 
        [ch]A[/ch]
And its hard to get downhearted 
       [ch]G#m[/ch]               [ch]C#[/ch]
When I think of what's in store 
         [ch]F#m[/ch]             [ch]B[/ch]
It’s the day I’m waiting for 
        [ch]F#m[/ch]   [ch]B[/ch]         [ch]E[/ch]
And its just around the corner 

OUTRO: [ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]B[/ch] [ch]B[/ch] [ch]F#m[/ch] [ch]B[/ch] [ch]E[/ch] [ch]E[/ch]

Capo 4th Fret

Beautiful song from our brothers. All credit for the chords go to this video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0xqCkcWIZyY with only very few alterations.

Enjoy!

name: Brotherly Love
tuning: E A D G B E

content.text:
JW Broadcasting August 2018
Capo 6th fret
Chords are not 100% but sound quite nice
Finger picking something like that:

[ch]C/G[/ch]               [ch]Fmaj9[/ch]             [ch]Fmaj13[/ch]
e|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------|
B|-----------------|-----------------|-----------------|
G|-------0-------0-|-------0-------0-|-------0-------0-|

A|-----3---3---3---|-----3---3---3---|-----3---3---3---|
E|-3---------------|-1---------------|-1---------------|

[Phrase 1]
    [ch]C/G[/ch]
Wherever you go, you will have fam'ly near
            [ch]C/G[/ch]
because wherever you go Jehovah's people are there.
                [ch]Fmaj9[/ch]
And you'll feel love,
                              [ch]C/G[/ch]
you'll feel love, a brotherly love.
            [ch]Fmaj9[/ch]
So feel the love ... oooh ..

[Phrase 2]
[ch]C/G[/ch]
Brothers and sisters all over the world
 [ch]C/G[/ch]
unite with Jehovah and follow his Son
             [ch]Fmaj9[/ch]
to bring you love -
                          [ch]C/G[/ch]
a nation of, of brotherly love.
            [ch]Fmaj9[/ch]         [ch]C/G[/ch]
So feel the love ... oooh ..

[Interlude]
    [ch]Fmaj13[/ch]                 [ch]C/G[/ch]
Our father provides for us all -
[ch]Fmaj13[/ch]
No one left over.

[Phrase 3]
[ch]C/G[/ch]
Deep in the jungle or on mountains high
   [ch]C/G[/ch]
in big, moderns cities or on islands afar,
      [ch]Fmaj9[/ch]                             [ch]C/G[/ch]
you belong, you belong to the people of God
            [ch]Fmaj9[/ch]         [ch]C/G[/ch]
So feel the love ... oooh ..

[Interlude]
    [ch]Fmaj13[/ch]                 [ch]C/G[/ch]
Our father provides for us all -
[ch]Fmaj13[/ch]
No one left over.

[Bridge]
       [ch]C[/ch]                    [ch]Am[/ch]
But in the world, it can be cold -
  [ch]Dm[/ch]                       [ch]G[/ch]
a scary place, truth to be told.
       [ch]C[/ch]                  [ch]Am[/ch]
So how wonderful it is to know
    [ch]Dm[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]
the one true God and his people, ooh.

[Phrase 4]
[ch]C/G[/ch]
Jesus, he taught his disciples to love.
   [ch]C/G[/ch]
So millions of people, as a nation, they show
          [ch]Fmaj9[/ch]                                 [ch]C/G[/ch]
Jehovah's love - And you'll belong among all of them.

            [ch]Fmaj9[/ch]                               [ch]C/G[/ch]

name: I Keep Your Reminders

content.text:
Another excellent song. As it's done on piano, some of the chords at the end with the bass notes ascending 
could be difficult on guitar, but they can be simplified to just F and G and it sounds fine. It's very jazzy
so I may have missed a few 7th chords here and there. Let me know. Enjoy!

[Intro]
[ch]C[/ch] [ch]G[/ch] [ch]C[/ch] [ch]G[/ch]

[Verse 1]
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch] 
 What Should I do?
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch]

[ch]Am[/ch]                                      [ch]Dm[/ch] 
 This could just be harmless could be respectable
[ch]Am[/ch]                                [ch]Dm[/ch]  
 There may be no need for me to reject it all
   [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]Fmaj7[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch] 
Oh What is the right course for me? Which path will it be?

[Verse 2]
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch] 
 What Should I do?
[ch]C[/ch]                        [ch]G[/ch] 
 And Take which point of view?
[ch]Am[/ch]                               [ch]Dm[/ch] 
 It could be excessive with many dangers there
[ch]Am[/ch]                                           [ch]Dm[/ch]  
 All the kinds of things that could prove to be a snare
   [ch]F[/ch]           [ch]Fmaj7[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]                          [ch]G7[/ch]
Oh What is the right course for me? Jehovah give ear to my plea

[Chorus 1]
  [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]C7[/ch] 
I keep your reminders and I love them dearly
  [ch]Am[/ch]                  [ch]Am7[/ch] 
I treasure them every day monthly yearly
        [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]Fmaj7[/ch] 
All the things I have heard
   [ch]G[/ch]                [ch]G7[/ch]           [ch]C[/ch]
In accord with your word help me understand

[Verse 2]
[ch]C[/ch]                [ch]G[/ch] 
 I know what's required
[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]G[/ch] 
 I'd better inquire
[ch]Am[/ch]                               [ch]Dm[/ch] 
 I don't want to act in a way to cause offence
[ch]Am[/ch]                                        [ch]Dm[/ch]  
 But it sounds like there likely would be consequence
     [ch]F[/ch]                [ch]Fmaj7[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]                      [ch]G7[/ch]
It's clear what's the right course for me, the key, the guarantee

[Chorus 2]
  [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]C7[/ch] 
I keep your reminders and I love them dearly

        [ch]F[/ch]             [ch]Fmaj7[/ch]

[ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]Em[/ch]   [ch]Am[/ch]   [ch]Dm[/ch]   [ch]F[/ch] [ch]Fmaj7[/ch]   [ch]G[/ch] [ch]G7[/ch]

[ch]D[/ch]           [ch]A[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]
I'm just a cart,
            [ch]G[/ch]       (A)       [ch]D[/ch]

   [ch]D[/ch]                   [ch]G[/ch]

If you could see, the people there

When they see things thay've never had a chance to see.

        [ch]G[/ch]               [ch]A[/ch]      [ch]D[/ch]

I've got wheels, I've got racks, 
          [ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]D[/ch]

          [ch]F#m[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
When the crouds pass me by,

    [ch]Em[/ch]           [ch]F#m[/ch]              [ch]G[/ch]

                 [ch]A[/ch]
'cause I'll be there.

    [ch]Ab[/ch]            [ch]Bb[/ch]
